summary: Blizzard Entertainment is an American video game company based in California. It was founded in 1991 by three friends and originally made games for other companies. They created their first games, *Rock n' Roll Racing* and *The Lost Vikings*, in 1993. The company changed its name to Blizzard and released the popular *Warcraft* series. Since then, they've made many successful games like *Diablo*, *StarCraft*, and *Overwatch*. Blizzard also organizes events like BlizzCon for fans to meet and play their games. Recently, Microsoft bought the company, but Blizzard will still make games independently.
title: Blizzard Entertainment
